title: Ransi Clark
text: I specialize on estimating dynamic causal effects of aggregate political units. I have a preference for modular estimators that easily render for diagnostics. I design and implement the methods and apply to a wide range of treatment settings including democratization, and natural disasters.

title: Ransi Clark
text:

title: Software
text:
didwrappers


Extends the functionality of the did package, specifically for within treatment-group heterogeneity and unbalanced data. It also allows for additional type of aggregations













matchematics


A helper function with matching and weighting techniques













causalforensics


Unravels the weights of estimates of regressions and other causal estimation techniques
